data.name: Desk by Chariott
data.description: Advanced web platform optimizing hotel operations
data.longDescription: Desk by Chariott is a comprehensive web application that transforms hotel operations through AI-powered insights and efficient management tools. Staff can monitor real-time operations, manage guest requests, and access predictive analytics through a secure, role-based dashboard that streamlines interdepartmental communication and resource allocation.
impact: • Built AI-powered dashboard with RBAC (50+ APIs, 14 services)
• First place winner at Marriott Codefest 2024
features: AI assistance: AI powered insights for operational efficiency and guest satisfaction
Secure Access: Role-based data access for privacy
Guest Profiles: Real-time access to guest info
Request Alerts: Immediate notifications of guest needs
Task Assignment: Easily assigns and prioritizes tasks
Inventory Tracking: Manages amenities and service availability
Communication Hub: Streamlines inter-department messaging
Data Insights: Guest trends and service response times

data.name: Independent Queens
data.description: AI-powered women's health and empowerment platform
data.longDescription: Independent Queens is a comprehensive women empowerment platform that integrates personalized health tracking, AI-powered scheduling, and skill marketplace features. The platform provides phase-specific wellness recommendations, emotional well-being tracking, and a community-driven skill exchange system.
impact: • Built platform with 27 FastAPI endpoints and AI integration
• Won Capital One's Best Financial Hack at HackViolet 2024
features: AI Scheduling: Personalized schedule optimization based on menstrual phase
Health Tracking: Phase-specific wellness recommendations
Skill Marketplace: Community-driven skill exchange across 5 domains
Canvas Integration: Synchronization with academic schedules
Real-time Analytics: Emotional well-being and health insights
Secure Platform: AWS Cognito authentication and MongoDB data storage

data.name: Animal Video Game
data.description: IoT platform for automated cow cognitive testing
data.longDescription: An innovative interdisciplinary platform combining IoT and cloud computing for automated animal cognitive testing. The system processes real-time behavioral data through secure farm-to-cloud infrastructure, enabling researchers to analyze animal cognitive patterns through an intelligent dashboard.
impact: • Led 5-person cloud infrastructure team across 3 engineering domains
• Engineered real-time farm-to-cloud data processing system
features: Secure Farm-to-Cloud Infrastructure: Tailscale VPN and SSH remote access
Real-time Data Processing: Automated pipelines with AWS Lambda
Intelligent Dashboard: Next.js visualization of cognitive patterns
IoT Integration: Raspberry Pi-based hardware interface
Automated Testing: Custom cognitive bias testing system
Secure Data Storage: DynamoDB with real-time updates

data.name: Chariott
data.description: AI-powered mobile app revolutionizing hotel guest experiences
data.longDescription: Chariott is a React Native mobile application that transforms hotel guest experiences through AI-powered personalization and multilingual support (130+ languages). Guests can manage room settings, access 24/7 AI assistance, explore local attractions, and receive personalized recommendations while maintaining seamless communication with hotel staff.
impact: • Enhanced accessibility with dyslexia mode for inclusive experience
features: AI Chatbot Assistance: 24/7 support for quick answers and requests.
Personalized Recommendations: Tailored attractions and amenities
Self-Service Booking: Easy room booking and check-in
In-Stay Requests: Quick ordering of services
Itinerary & Explorer: Manage bookings and explore locally
Preference Settings: Guests set room and service preferences
Eco Ratings: View sustainability of offerings
Direct Communication: Instant messaging with hotel staff
Feedback & Reviews: Post-stay insights for improvement
Multi-language support

data.name: InstaShop
data.description: Web app which finds shortest path to your groceries
data.longDescription: Have you ever ran back and forth in a grocery store? Worry not! We have implemented collaboration with Target to help you find your groceries and return the shortest path to enter and exit the store.
impact: • Reduced processing time from 7min to 1sec (99.76% faster)
• Using real time data from Target API
features: Real-time inventory checking via Target's Retail API
Optimized breadth-first search implementation
Reduced path calculation time from exponential to just seconds
Digital recreation of store layout using graph data structures
Item-by-item navigation guidance
React frontend with TypeScript
Python backend for algorithmic processing
Support for varying store layouts

data.name: Mapability
data.description: AI-powered accessibility mapping platform with comprehensive building insights
data.longDescription: Award-winning platform that transforms accessibility navigation using AI. Features 32+ building attributes across 8 accessibility categories, real-time filtering, and personalized route planning with dyslexia-friendly interface.
impact: • Engineered 25 API endpoints processing 32+ building attributes
• Implemented real-time filtering across 8 accessibility categories
• Deployed live system using AWS Amplify with 3 UI accessibility modes
features: Serverless architecture with FastAPI and AWS Lambda
Multi-dimensional rating system across 8 accessibility categories
Real-time MongoDB aggregation pipeline
AI-powered personalized route planning
Dyslexia-friendly interface with 3 accessibility modes
OpenAI integration for intelligent recommendations
Custom review aggregation system
Async processing for real-time updates
Comprehensive building accessibility profiles
MongoDB async operations for scalability
Docker containerization for consistent deployment
AWS Amplify for frontend deployment
Structured data processing with function calling
Dynamic accessibility scoring algorithm

data.name: Rhythm and Rise
data.description: Web app for balancing diet & exercise during menstrual phases
data.longDescription: Rhythm and Rise is a web application that helps users balance their diet and exercise routines with their menstrual phases. The app has a calendar view that displays the user's cycle and provides affirmations. It has an interactive easy to use UI.
impact: • Ability to track all 4 menstrual phases and their effects
• Phase specific diet and exercise recommendations
features: Phase-specific workout recommendations across the menstrual cycle
Support for different dietary preferences (vegan, vegetarian, omnivore)
Tailored exercise plans for different fitness styles (cardio, strength training, yoga)
Full-stack MERN application (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)
Calendar integration using Syncfusion
Evidence-based approach incorporating women's health research
User research integration through surveys and feedback
Comprehensive tracking across all menstrual cycle phases (Menstrual, Follicular, Ovulation, Luteal)

data.name: AI-powered teaching assistant
data.description: An AI teaching assitant which uses professors notes and web
data.longDescription: This tool is a real time time AI teaching assistant which uses professors notes and web to help students understand the topic better. This tool uses the notes the professor has uploaded and the web to help students learn. There is a contradiction check to make sure the students are learning the right thing.
impact: • Implemented 6 AI agents for streamlined learning via LangGraph
• Ability to verify contradictions in learning material
features: Multi-professor knowledge integration with real-time web information synthesis
Personalized response generation based on individual professor's teaching style
Real-time translation capabilities for global accessibility
Secure document management system for instructors
Automated PDF processing and indexing
Customizable UI themes and fonts
Vector database integration for efficient knowledge retrieval
Web intelligence integration through Tavily API
Multi-agent system leveraging LangGraph
AWS cloud infrastructure integration (S3, Lambda, DynamoDB)
User authentication with email verification
Protected API endpoints
Real-time document status tracking
Dynamic query processing using advanced language models
Multiple presentation style options

data.name: AI-powered chatbot
data.description: A intelligent chatbot system for LEWAS Lab
data.longDescription: Developed a production-grade AI assistant for Virginia Tech's LEWAS Lab using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture. The system processes research documents and lab data to provide accurate, context-aware responses about water quality monitoring and research. Built with a serverless architecture using AWS services, the chatbot features real-time query processing, secure authentication, and efficient document management. The system can handle concurrent users and process 500+ technical documents while maintaining high response accuracy.
impact: • Ability to handle 500+ documents and 100+ concurrent users
• Served as foundation in development of AI teaching assistant
features: 100+ concurrent users supported through serverless architecture
Real-time chat interface with message history
Secure authentication using AWS Cognito
Advanced RAG system using AWS Bedrock and Pinecone
Document processing with automatic PDF vectorization
Intelligent chunking with metadata preservation
Source attribution with Google Drive integration
User feedback system for response quality
API key-based security middleware
DynamoDB-backed query storage and analytics
Docker containerization for scalability
Infrastructure as Code using AWS CDK
Cross-platform compatibility
Efficient vector similarity search
Real-time query tracking and analytics
